summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Quick ID Reader hotel app with multi-document scanning feature. All backend APIs working perfectly (44/44 tests passed). Frontend login, navigation, and key features tested successfully including multi-document support verification.
passed_tests: All backend API endpoints working (100% pass rate - 44/44 tests)
POST /api/guests creates guest with all fields
GET /api/rate-limits returns correct rate limit config
Login page loads with proper form elements
Scan page shows 'Ã§oklu kimlik destekli' text (multi-document support)
Navigation works across all pages (Dashboard, Scan, Bulk Scan, Guests, Users, Settings)
Rate limiting working correctly (5/min for login, 15/min for scan, 30/min for guest creation)
Multi-document scanning API structure properly implemented
Admin-only features protected (Users, Settings admin functions)
Guest CRUD operations with audit trail
